item.description:
Sorry about the time change, but I need to be somewhere at 3:30, and need to move up the time. Hope people can still make it.

Anti Forno validates parking at the Parcel 7 Garage (formerly the Sudbury Garage) from Congress St, make a right on Sudbury St and entrance is on right inside on ramp, for the following rates:
$1.00 for up to 2 hours $3.00 for 3 hours - bring your parking ticket to the box office for validation stamp VALIDATION VOID AFTER 3 HOURS Parkers will then be charged the regular rate of $5.00 per hour for the FULL TIME the vehicle was parked. Call (617) 973-6954 for directions to parking.

The Globe recently published a list of the 10 best pizzerias in Boston, and four are in the North End
1) Antico Forno 93 Salem Street 02113 (617) 723-6733
2) Ernesto's 69 Salem Street 02113 (617) 523-4639
3) Galleria Umberto 289 Hanover Street (between Lathrop Place & Parmenter Street) 02113 (617) 227-5709
4) Regina Pizza 11 1/2 Thacher Street 02113 (617) 227-0765)
My idea is we get a large pizza to go from each, grab a bottle or two of vino and head over to Christopher Columbus park for a pizza picnic.

13 People liked this idea, so I think it's popular enough to schedule it. Let's have lunch on Saturday, August 7th. (Rain date August 8th). We can meet at the busway at Haymarket Station and then go to the North End to buy our pizzas. I'll send my contact info a few to everyone who RSVPs Yes or Maybe a few days prior to the meetup.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Pizzeria Crawl
